::: {.minipage data-latex="{\textwidth}"}
## `SetBoxPlotOpacity`

Sets box opacity (in box plots) for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetBoxPlotOpacity(number opacity)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `number` opacity | The opacity level (should be between 0--255) |
:::
